name: Open with Atom
description: Support you to open a file or folder directly with Atom. Then, you can start the file edition immediately. If you haven't installed Atom, it will let you quickly get the Atom installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

apps.name: Atom

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with Atom.
